title: What's the difference between exclude, prevent, avoid, and exclude? - Quora

response.answer_text: Exclude: to remove from consideration; the opposite of “include”.Prevent: to take steps to make sure something does not happen.Avoid: to distance oneself (physically or metaphorically) from something or someone.

You said exclude twice, but exclude is to sequester a person from a group function. Avoid is a personal preference to not participate in a function or person. Prevent is to preempt an occurrence from happening.
